path: To Be Organized/Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/MOS Gateways/MOS Gateways.docx
text: MOS Gateways IP Addresses MSNBC Viz Gateway - 100.113.83.67 Network Viz Gateway - 100.113.83.68 Each MOS Gateway runs an MSE as a Windows service. This can be stopped and started from the launcher. The Viz Gateway Controller shows details of monitored rundowns in the Active RO's tab. If a rundown is monitored on but content is not appearing in Trio or Director, and the rundown does not appear here, contact the on-call Media Tech for iNews (x45522) or the News Helpdesk (x4161). Please close when finished viewing.
